Key Match Events: Hungary led in the 32nd minute with a goal by Roland Sallai
Denzel Dumfries headed a late equaliser for the Netherlands
Pre-Game Insights: The Dutch created numerous chances but did not create all that much in the way of chances in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the team for their fight and resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary had been hoping for a first win over the Netherlands in 40 years, but did at least end a run of nine straight defeats against the Dutch
